name: Sir Ewind
description:
Meet Sir Ewind, a time travelling space wizard, assigned with the difficult task of eliminating all Paradox Creatures. The task itself is made that much more difficult due to the fact that he is not allowed the use of any weapons. His code of conduct prevents him from purchasing any firearms, such as: 9mm pistols, AK-47 rifles, double-barreled shotguns, long-scoped sniper rifles etc. His code also prevents him from using any blunt instruments, including his staff. That being said, he does have the power of space-time continuum at his fingertips, including the ability to both rewind and completely freeze time around him, which is a considerable advantage.

Buttons:

Movement - WASD
Jump - Space
Restart - R
Interact with Object - Left Click
Freeze Single Enemy(not available from the start) - Right Click
Interact with door - E
Rewind Time - Q
Freeze Time - F

Details - This is a game made for the 4th Brackeys Game Jam, theme being "Rewind".
Total Dev Time - 1 Week

Font Used - m5x7 by Daniel Linssen

Sound samples: - soundbible.com
- freesound.org

Edit:

There is an issue when pressing the left alt key. It was supposed to be the button for the original time freeze mechanic, but some code was left over by mistake, which causes the game to act a bit weird. Pressing alt again will fix the issue.
